name: Wily Underdog
abilities: Once per day, you can reroll a failed Strength-based roll (attack, save, Power test, grapple) and use a different stat instead.

name: Bumblewise
abilities: A result of 1 or less on a Wisdom-based roll (Will save, Initiative, Naturecraft or Perception test) counts as a natural 20.

name: Back Out of Retirement
abilities: You can take 1 Injury to use an ability or cast a spell as if you were one level higher.
Your aging body shows signs of wear, reducing your max Injuries by 1.

You know someone who has the info you need or can bail you out. Roll a d20: 1–5: They want you dead. 6–12: You owe them money. 13–19: They can be convinced to help. 20: They’re your biggest fan/love-struck.

name: History Buff
abilities: Advantage on all Lore checks related to objects, facts, or events more than 100 years old.

name: Ear to the Ground
abilities: Advantage on checks to learn or gather info about events happening soon or within the past year.

name: Ugly/Scarred
abilities: Exotic creatures and wild animals are more favorable to you; ‘civilized’ people may react poorly.
Advantage on intimidation attempts.

name: Acrobat/Gymnast
abilities: Can be thrown by a strong ally over a long distance.
Take half damage from falls and forced movement.

name: Former Con Artist
abilities: You can forge most documents and mimic voices perfectly.
You have criminal contacts in major cities.
Your rep may precede you until you prove trustworthy.

name: Devoted Protector
abilities: Choose an ally in your party. You can survive 3 more Injuries while they’re nearby.
When they take an Injury, so do you.
If they die, you die too.

name: Fearless
abilities: Nothing scares you.
No one can intimidate you.
-1 Armor.

name: Fey Touched
abilities: Take half damage from all magical effects.
Take double damage from metal weapons.

name: Haunted Past
abilities: You are haunted by voices giving cryptic advice. Sometimes helpful, sometimes cruel.

name: Survivalist
abilities: You never run out of personal rations.
Anything can be food if you try hard enough!
Advantage on poison saves.
Max +1 Hit Die.

name: Home at Sea
abilities: Recover twice as many Injuries and HP when resting on a ship or near water.
Can replace a bosun or captain if needed.
Advantage on water-related checks.

name: So Dumb I'm Smart Sometimes
abilities: Once per day, reroll an Intelligence-based skill check.
Once per long rest, reroll a Will save.

name: At Home Underground
abilities: You dig twice as fast.
Safe rest areas underground always count as luxurious for you.
You struggle to rest (Will save) when it rains.

name: Accidental Acrobat
abilities: Whenever you fail a Dexterity-based roll (attack, save, Stealth, Finesse), you may reroll.
If you fail again, the consequences are severe.
